original_title: LAUGFS Supermarkets recognised as one of the most loved brands in Sri Lanka
original_body_lines: LAUGFS Supermarkets has been selected as one of the most loved brands in LMD’s Brands Annual Ranking 2023, compiled by Brand Finance Lanka. This recognition is a testament to the exceptional quality, trust, and customer loyalty that LAUGFS Supermarkets has cultivated over the years.

Brand Finance and LMD Sri Lanka, highly respected organizations in the field of brand evaluation and recognition, conducted a rigorous assessment to determine the most loved brands in the country. LAUGFS Supermarkets emerged as one of the top brands based on a comprehensive evaluation of various factors, including customer preference, brand perception, and market influence.

“We are humbled to have received this prestigious recognition. As a Sri Lankan entity, we strive to evoke a special sense of trust and pride among our customers by supporting local brands. Through our exceptional customer service and a wide range of high-quality products, we have forged lasting connections with our customers and have become a trusted shopping destination amongst many. We will continue to invest in our brands to make a positive difference in the lives of our consumers,” says LAUGFS Supermarkets Chief Executive Officer, Pravin David.
Round II of SpeedStar 2023 concludes at SpeedBay at Port City
